Technology influences education, and online courses are becoming increasingly common.

Remote learning is also on the rise, revolutionizing the way we learn from anywhere in the world.

This shift towards online and remote learning models has been driven by advances in trends, such as the use of technology.

However, there are still challenges to overcome, including concerns about accessibility and quality assurance.
